title: Peacock
description:
A peacock, the male bird that displays a large, fan-like, iridescent tale. Depicted facing forward standing on its legs, with a blue body and green tail feathers outspread.

Sometimes used to suggest something is beautiful or proud. Also sometimes used to accent a peacock-like color or pattern.
apple_vendor_description: The peacock emoji on Apple devices is a magnificent bird, captured in all its iridescent glory with Apple's renowned attention to detail and glossy 3D rendering. Its elaborate tail feathers fan out, displaying a spectrum of vibrant blues and greens with shimmering highlights that suggest a luxurious, almost jewel-like quality. The gentle curves and realistic lighting on Apple devices imbue this emoji with a sense of beauty, pride, and exotic elegance, often used to represent vanity, showmanship, or admiration.
